CustomField.description: Semicolon delineated list of field API names on the Contract_Entitlement__c object to be shown in the Entitlement Summary view in CPQ. Any Contract_Entitlement__c Custom Field API names are supported.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: List of field API names on the Contract_Entitlement__c object to be shown in the Entitlement Summary view in CPQ. Any Contract_Entitlement__c Custom Field API names are supported.
CustomField.label: Entitlement Summary Columns
